bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of newborns with stagnant blood in their eyes as a result of a difficult birth, in serious cases obfuscating the pupil, in light cases causing redness and swelling of the eyes. HYKY 4: 議血眼：…盛則灌注其睛，不見瞳人；輕則外胞 赤腫，上下爛眩 , “To define ‘ blood eyes ’: …When [the blood] is abundant, it flows into the eyes and the pupil is no longer visible. In slight cases the eyelids on the outside are red and swollen. Above and below there is festering and vision is blurred”.
